basics.name: Evan Parker
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineer and Technical Leader with expertise in big data, cloud infrastructure, workflow orchestration, and secure data integrations.

work.name: Joint Center for Satellite Data Assimilation, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research
work.summary: Lead a team of engineers at JCSDA, managing infrastructure, data pipelines, and workflow orchestration for high-volume scientific forecasting models.
highlights: Launched new workflow results and experimental data management service.

work.name: Verily Life Sciences
work.summary: Developed and maintained cloud-based ETL pipelines, ensuring secure and scalable data processing for sensitive healthcare data.
highlights: Built and managed Airflow-driven workflows for large-scale data integration.
Led cloud security policy initiatives, including IAM and compliance auditing.

work.name: Google Fiber
work.summary: Developed and optimized data pipelines and reporting tools to support business metrics and regulatory compliance.
highlights: Built SQL-based ETL pipelines for executive metrics on construction and sales.
Created a compliance reporting tool for FCC regulations.
